text: Of course Pence still does this. The other day in an interview he said that Trump didn't create a false equivalence between Nazi and KKK rioters and peaceful protestors in Charlottesville, who were attacked by the Nazis and KKKs. "Of course he didn't create a false equivalence," says Pence, looking disgusted at the lies he has to put down. His low info supporters nod their heads. Can't trust those libtards they mutter under their breath. But anyone who actually watched the president (wish I hadn't) knows he totally created a false equivalence (even though Trump probably doesn't know what one is).
